essence|25193}}}} ===Levels 82–91/95/99: Double astral runes=== {{plinkp|Astral rune}} {{plinkp|Astral rune}} Crafting double [[astral rune]]s offers fairly slow experience, but it usually yields good profit depending on the rune prices. Players can craft two astral runes per pure essence at level 82, and they grant 8.7 experience per pure essence used. Even though astral runes become available at level 40, it is not recommended to craft them before level 82 due to much lower profit. Players must have completed [[Lunar Diplomacy]] to be able to craft astral runes. The player should use all 4 essence pouches and be on the Lunar spellbook. Use [[Tele Group Moonclan]], run south and click over the river; the pathfinder will find the most efficient path for you to get to the bridge. From the bridge run east to the altar, craft runes and bank at [[Castle Wars]] (using a [[ring of dueling]]) or [[Crafting Guild]] (using the [[Crafting cape]]). Once you have teleported to Castle Wars or Crafting Guild, store the astral runes you crafted in your rune pouch while running to the bank chest. Using a [[dust battlestaff]] with law, cosmic, and astral runes in the [[rune pouch]] is the best way to negate the need to take out any runes to use Tele Group Moonclan and [[NPC Contact]] spells. It also recommended to wear some defensive equipment (such as an amulet of fury and a dragonfire shield) and/or a regen bracelet, because [[Suqah]] can hit very accurately against players who are not wearing any armour. It is also lower effort than abyssal runecrafting, requiring only 3–4 clicks from the Lunar Isle Teleport spot to the Astral Altar. Players can gain up to 33,000–34,000 experience per hour. [[Raiments of the Eye]] gives a 10% increased rate of an extra rune when crafting for each piece equipped, with a 1.6x multiplier when equipping the full set. It has been noted that should the result not be a perfect divisible of 6 when the full set is equipped, there is an unknown chance that an additional 6 runes will be rewarded. {| class="wikitable" {{plinkp|Nature rune}} {{plinkp|Nature rune}} Crafting double [[nature rune]]s offers very slow experience, but it can yield good profit depending on the rune prices. Players are able to craft two nature runes per pure essence at level 91, and they grant 9 experience per pure essence. Even though nature runes become available at level 44, it is not recommended to craft them before level 91 due to much lower profit. Players can craft nature runes through the Abyss, or by using the fairy ring {{Fairycode|ckr}} and running to the [[Nature Altar|altar]]. For the fairy ring method, players will need to have a quick access to a fairy ring that does not take up inventory space, such as [[quest point cape]], [[Construct. cape|Construction cape]] or [[necklace of passage]]; and use a [[ring of dueling]] to bank at [[Castle Wars]]. The Abyss and fairy ring methods are very similar in speed; players with low Mining and Agility are likely to get higher rates using the fairy ring, and players without fast access to a fairy ring should use the Abyss. Training Runecraft from level 91 to level 99 using this method requires 792,400 pure essence and yields 1,584,800 nature runes, which can be sold for tremendous profit. [[Raiments of the Eye]] gives a 10% increased rate of an extra rune when crafting for each piece equipped, with a 1.6x multiplier when equipping the full set. It has been noted that should the result not be a perfect divisible of 6 when the full set is equipped, there is an unknown chance that an additional 6 runes will be rewarded. {| class="wikitable" |+Double Abyss Nature Runes !Level {{SCP|Runecraft}} !XP/Run !Value/Run !XP 45 Inventories/Hour !GP 45 Inventories/Hour !XP 50 Inventories/Hour !GP 50 Inventories/Hour !XP 55 Inventories/Hour !GP 55 Inventories/Hour |- |91 |603* |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}}} |27,135 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}*45}} |30,150 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}*50}} |33,165 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}*55}} |} {| class="wikitable" |+Double Abyss Nature Runes W/ Raiments of the Eye Full Set !Level {{SCP|Runecraft}} !XP/Run !Value/Run !XP 45 Inventories/Hour !GP 45 Inventories/Hour !XP 50 Inventories/Hour !GP 50 Inventories/Hour !XP 55 Inventories/Hour !GP 55 Inventories/Hour |- |91 |603* |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}*1.6}} |27,135 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}*45*1.6}} |30,150 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}*50*1.6}} |33,165 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|67*2}}*55*1.6}} |} * with the expectation that you are using the [[Colossal pouch]] Note: These figures above do not include the cost for recharging amulets of glory, stamina potions, and pure essence. *Experience needed (91–99): 7,131,600 *[[Pure essence]] needed: 792,400 *№ of inventories (54 ess per inventory): 14,675 *Total profit: {{Coins|{{GEP|Nature rune|1584800}}-{{GEP|Pure essence|792400}}}} ===Levels 95–99: Double law runes=== ''For more information about runecrafting through the Abyss, see [[Abyss/Strategies]]''.
{{plinkp|Law rune}} {{plinkp|Law rune}} Crafting double [[law rune]]s offers very slow experience, but it can yield good profit depending on the rune prices. Players are able to craft two law runes per pure essence at level 95, and they grant 9.5 experience per pure essence used. Even though law runes become available at level 54, it is not recommended to craft them before level 95 due to much lower profit. The fastest way of crafting law runes is through the Abyss. However, players cannot bring any weapons or armour as the [[Law Altar]] is located on [[Entrana]]. This can be overcome by bringing a [[bronze pickaxe]] to every trip and dropping it before entering the portal. It is faster to have a pickaxe in the inventory and use the Mining obstacles, than use the Thieving obstacles which do not require any space. Alternatively, players can use the [[balloon transport system]] from [[Castle Wars]] to [[Entrana]], run to the altar and bank at Castle Wars. This is slightly slower than using the Abyss, but requires paying less attention. Each trip with a balloon uses a regular log, and it is recommended to store multiple logs into the crates beforehand to save a bit of time. When arriving to Entrana, click straight north and this will result in the pathfinder generating a path to run all around the island, which can then be cancelled after crossing the bridge to get to the Law Altar. Training Runecraft from level 95 to level 99 using this method requires 448,724 pure essence and yields 897,448 law runes, which can be sold for tremendous profit. [[Raiments of the Eye]] gives a 10% increased rate of an extra rune when crafting for each piece equipped, with a 1.6x multiplier when equipping the full set. It has been noted that should the result not be a perfect divisible of 6 when the full set is equipped, there is an unknown chance that an additional 6 runes will be rewarded. {| class="wikitable" |25 = Pure essence |26 = Pure essence |27 = Pure essence |28 = Pure essence }} {{plinkp|Wrath rune}} Crafting [[wrath rune]]s offers fairly slow experience, but it usually yields good profit. To be able to craft wrath runes, players must have completed [[Dragon Slayer II]]. Players will also need to run past aggressive dragons, so dragonfire protection is necessary. Players can gain up to around 30,000 experience per hour. At this rate, players would also make {{Coins|{{GEP|Wrath rune|3750}}-{{GEP|Pure essence|3750}}*1.6}} profit per hour at the current rune prices. Using this method from level 95 to 99 would take around 140 hours and would offer roughly {{Coins|{{GEP|Wrath rune|525000}}-{{GEP|Pure essence|525000}}}} profit. [[Raiments of the Eye]] gives a 10% increased rate of an extra rune when crafting for each piece equipped, with a 1.6x multiplier when equipping the full set. It has been noted that should the result not be a perfect divisible of 6 when the full set is equipped, there is an unknown chance that an additional 6 runes will be rewarded. ====Setup and runecrafting==== The optimal setup consists of the following: *[[Wrath tiara]] *A shield that offers [[dragonfire]] protection, such as the [[dragonfire shield]] *[[Mythical cape]] *[[Bank teleport]], such as the [[Crafting cape]] or a [[ring of dueling]] *All essence pouches *[[Weight-reducing clothing]] *[[Regen bracelet]] *Some defensive equipment For efficient banking, players should have essence, 1-dose stamina potions, runes for [[NPC Contact]], and some cheap food near the 'Deposit inventory' button. Players are also recommended to clear their mythical cape and essence pouch space holders, and fill the entire bank with bank fillers. This way, players can quickly deposit all the crafted runes without depositing any necessary items. This method goes as follows: # Fill pouches and inventory with essence. # Teleport to [[Myths' Guild]] with the mythical cape. # Run through cave and into altar. # Craft wrath runes. # Teleport to a bank, and repeat the process. Drink stamina potions, eat food as needed, and repair the essence pouches as needed. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Training guides}} [[Category:Runecraft]]
